name: Vitrun
description:
Originally released in 2012 for Mac and iOS only, Vitrun was the first game developed by Evasion Games, a newborn studio based in Spain. Why are we re-publishing Vitrun in 2019?

Basically because back in those days we never made the game available for Windows due to "reasons" and we felt like rescuing it from oblivion.

So have fun playing Vitrun and please consider leaving a comment or making a donation if you truly enjoyed the game. We will appreciate it!

And if you are or aspire to be an indie game developer maybe you want to take a look at GameFlow, our awesome visual scripting tool for Unity now available for free.

Synopsis

In the year 2174 the quest for habitable planets has become a necessity for the survival of the human race. Starships manned by robots explore the universe in the search for planets similar to The Earth.

Your destination is the space base Hexa and your mission is to train the ultimate exploration robot -codenamed VIT- by completing 18 training circuits full of obstacles in a frantic race against time.
